For the people who don't know how to instal. Unpack (or copy) the files to: C:\Program Files\Image-Line\FL Studio 8\Data\Patches

Or if you are using FL7, 6, 5  or older, copy to

C:\Program Files\Image-Line\FL Studio (7)((6)(5)(older)\Data\Patches

:-)
